original: Bergelin, Harald Olof, fd. landssekreterare, Jönköping, f. 12/1/81 i Karlskrona av köpm. Alfred B. o. Ida Lindström. G. 17 m. Elsa Eriksson. Barn: Peter f. 18, Ulla 20, Carin 25. - Mog:-ex. i Karlskrona 00, ex. t. rätteg :väs. i Lund 05. E. o. not. i hovr. över Skåne o. Blek. 05, tf. domhav. i Östra härads doms. t. 08, e. bitr. v. länsstyr. i Sthlms 1. 08, landskansl. o. e. länsnot. i Hall. 1. 09, andre länsnot. i Örebro 1. 10, förste länsnot. 17, länsassessor 19, landssekr. i Jönköp. 1. 33-46, pens. 46. RNO, RVO.
translated: Bergelin, Harald Olof, former county secretary, Jönköping, born on January 12, 1881 in Karlskrona to merchant Alfred B. and Ida Lindström. Married in 1917 to Elsa Eriksson. Children: Peter born in 1918, Ulla in 1920, Carin in 1925. He passed the examination from the Naval Academy in Karlskrona in 1900, and the examination for district court judge in Lund in 1905. He served as a clerk and notary in the Court of Appeal of Skåne and Blekinge in 1905, acting district court judge in Östra härads domsaga until 1908, Extra Deputy County Governor in Stockholm in 1908, county secretary and county notary in Halland in 1909, second county notary in Örebro in 1910, first county notary in 1917, county assessor in 1919, county secretary in Jönköping from 1933 to 1946, and retired in 1946. Awarded with the Order of the North Star and the Royal Victorian Order.

memberOf.name: Court of Appeal of Skåne and Blekinge
County Secretary and County Notary - Halland

award.name: Royal Victorian Order
award.description: Awarded for services to the British Crown.
